channel.title: Aim
channel.description: I had a question for all of those out there who have tyhe most updated version of AIM. Do you know how to set it so that when people send you a message while you are "away" or you are set on a away message that it wont pop up on your screen, and while just be in a window so you have to open it to see them? Just like the old one? thx alot

item.title: Aim
item.dc:creator: @poopy4231 poopy4231
item.description:
@poopy4231 wrote:

its not that hard… just set up an away message like u normally do and check all 3 boxes and it wont pop up or make sounds

Read full topic

item.title: Aim
item.dc:creator: @sixfeetunder sixfeetunder
item.description:
@sixfeetunder wrote:

just get gaim, or trillian. the real aim client sucks.

Read full topic
